content: Cordless tower light SL 10-22 Powerful tower light with 360° light coverage for cordless, indoor jobsite illumination ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Jobsite essentials- - ### FEATURES:Features Easily shift to a power supply thanks to the AC interface Easier setup - two extension steps with quicker release mechanism makes the lamp easier to assemble, and the intuitive grip and shoulder strap allow for easier carrying More stable footing - wider, three-legged design with a lower center of gravity helps the lamp remain more stable whatever the jobsite environment Drop-resistant design for a longer product life Shadow-free illumination - tower extension of up to 6’10” provides 360° light coverage Applications 360° illumination for visibility across walls, floors and ceilings IP55 rating for outdoor use at dawn, dusk or nighttime Tall enough to provide light across larger work areas without shining directly into users’ eyes Easier storage and transportation ### TECHNICAL DATA: Brightness: 6500 lm Weight: 20.83 lb.
